transcripts.text: Two calls left.  The last one, we're going to take Laura now.
I knew you were going to pick that one.

I love your show.

And he talks to you and answers questions?

well it seems that there's a way that we could we could test this and that is yes he's right here right now.  got god here right now.  ask god what you should say to me to convince me that he's real.
he loves you very much and you're doing an excellent job for him.
Yeah, that is not remotely the right answer.  So I guess we've tested.
You don't understand the job he's doing.  No.  You're doing this excellent job.

Oh, well, your heart has to be open to love.

No, I'm not.

Oh, you think it's a simple thing.

It's time.  and much study, and much...

I've done more time and more study on this subject than probably any believer you're likely to run across, and so yet that's another... You have access to God, Laura. No, you're assuming... That what I said was not what he said, because it's not what you're accepting.

Correct.

Yes.

Not everything.  What about simple things?

No, no, no, that's not what Dragnot is asking.  Let me try this.  If Dragnot were to think of a number between one and a million, would God know what number Dragnot is thinking of?
I would hope so.
And if you ask God to tell you what number Dragnot is thinking of, Would he answer that?
No, he wouldn't give me that information.
He doesn't play games.  Why not?  Ask God why he won't give you that information.

I'm thinking of a number.
I don't think that would.
